info(additional=""):

Prints the person’s name and age.

info(additional='')[source]

Prints the person’s name and age.

If the argument ‘additional’ is passed, then it is appended after the main info.

Parameters:

additional (str, optional) – More info to be displayed (default is None)

Return type:

None
